text: Bamako is a 2006 Malian French American drama movie directed by Abderrahmane Sissako and starring Aïssa Maïga, Tiécoura Traoré, Hélène Diarra. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2006 drama movies Category:Malian movies Category:French drama movies Category:2000s American drama movies
title: Bamako (movie)
